articles.title: Yankees defeat Rays to secure American League wild-card spot - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Aaron Judge hit an RBI-single in the bottom of the ninth inning and the New York Yankees triumphed to a 1-0 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays, guaranteeing a place in the American League wild-card game.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Gio Urshela made like Derek Jeter, and Aaron Judge was his quintessential self.
